title: Measurement of the vertical distributions of atmospheric pollutants using an uncrewed aerial vehicle platform in Xi'an, China
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1077-1089
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00020J, Paper
Dan Liang, Zhenchuan Niu, Guowei Wang, Xue Feng, Mengni Lyu, Xiaobing Pang, Ming Li, Huachun Gu
PM and CO concentrations below 500 m increased substantially during haze. Influences of horizontal and vertical transport were observed on vertical profiles.
